google.title: HelloTalk - Learn Languages
google.description: Practice languages with native speakers on HelloTalk! We recently introduced HelloTalk Live and Voiceroom - interactive language and culture events to help you master languages through the content you love! HelloTalk, the original language exchange app, connects you with native speakers to practice languages (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, Mandarin Chinese, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian, Arabic, Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, Thai, Vietnamese and 160+ more) for FREE! HelloTalk equips you with learning tools such as translation and instant captions so you can learn by chatting with native speakers. Learn languages from locals around the world through livestreams and Voicerooms. Connect with expert hosts to discuss interesting topics with language partners in the learning community! Why HelloTalk? ‚ñ∫ Real language learning atmosphere Whether you're focused on a widely spoken language or a less common one, HelloTalk caters to your needs. The system smartly matches you based on your native language and proficiency, while allowing you to filter ideal language partners according to various criteria such as age, location, and gender. Plus, with built-in translation and transliteration tools, you can communicate confidently without any language barriers. ‚ñ∫ A powerful tool for sharpening your language skills Acquiring new words through conversations with native speakers is more effective than rigid memorization. Whether you're a student preparing for exams like the CET, GRE, TOEFL, IELTS, planning to study abroad, or a professional seeking career advancement through language skills, HelloTalk offers native speakers who match your proficiency level for engaging interactions and valuable learning experiences. ‚ñ∫ Immersive multi-person language chat rooms If you choose to learn Spanish, for example, every Voiceroom you enter on HelloTalk gathers Spanish learners and Spanish native speakers from around the world to discuss interesting topics. Here, only your voice needs to be heard, creating a comfortable, introvert-friendly atmosphere. Here, sharing mutual interests allows everyone to freely express themselves and share personal experiences, fostering both language intuition and authentic expression skills. It's incredibly addictive! ‚ñ∫ Diverse global Livestreams HelloTalk features handpicked foreign language hosts who offer online video lessons, share language insights, and provide glimpses into their lives abroad. You can even join them on stage for one-on-one video conversations with fellow language learners. Whether you're grappling with pronunciation, speaking speed, or shyness, these hosts will assist you in refining your language skills and guiding the conversation. For rapid improvement in spoken language, there's no substitute for direct communication with native speakers! ‚ñ∫ International Moments HelloTalk's Moments offers real-time posts covering learning, lifestyle, and cultural insights from around the world. It's your ticket to discovering fresh perspectives and gaining deeper insights into diverse cultural customs, all from the comfort of your home. Don't forget to engage with posts that catch your interest! What the world is saying about HelloTalk ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏è ‚ù§Ô∏èüåüüåüüåü Editor's Choice - Google Play ‚ÄúOne of the best apps to help you learn a new language.‚Äù - 9to5Mac "When you're ready to experiment with a foreign language, HelloTalk provides an excellent opportunity for interaction with other speakers." ‚ÄìPCMag "HelloTalk, which connects native speakers with an apprentice, also offers language exchanges to its 20 million users in more than 150 languages." -Forbes START PRACTICING LANGUAGES RIGHT AWAY!!! Learn more about the HelloTalk app: - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Hellotalk/ - Twitter: https://twitter.com/hellotalkapp Send any feedback to support@hellotalk.com - Privacy Policy: https://www.hellotalk.com/privacy-policy - Terms of Use: https://www.hellotalk.com/terms-of-service

You HAVE to choose gender, and the options are only female or male. Please change this antiquated notion. I refuse to misgender myself. (I also don't understand why disclosing gender is mandatory.)

Not that good of an app. The idea is nice but people only start a conversation if you set your native language to English, and i didn't so i wanted to change it, but the app didn't allow me. There are way too many creeps and people looking for romance, and you have to pay if you want to study for more than 5 minutes. You also can't create a second account. I wanted to change my password but it didn't update, so i couldn't log in anymore.
Are you sure that this isn't a dating application?
Ik vind t een leuke app.Helaas moet je voor veel betalen en ik heb niet veel geld.Ook doet hij t vaak niet de laatste tijd.Hij loopt steeds vast.Wat is hiervan de oorzaak?
I think I would use the app more when I could study the language I want to learn. A pity Hebrew isn't an option yet.
Dating app. And don't delete my post!!

I had this app for almost 4 years but the last couple months they did some updates and now they made it impossible to enjoy the app without paying for it. Its a shame that the almost obligate you to pay to get a working app. After 4 years I deinstalled the app and neither recommend people to download this unless you want to pay for it. There a lot of other apps how are working fine on free mode.

This app is a stroke of genius, while you learn a new language by talking to new people around the world you also engage in the social part, it's nice to meet new people, even more so if you have a common interrest but also the social part keeps you engaged in learning the new language! It's also easily the most fun i've had with learning a new language and I hope the new friends i've met will remain so :)
Could use a landscape mode on tablets.

Good application. There are three annoying issues otherwise: 1. It takes too long to load chats on initial loading. 2. When looking through the chat history, only last messages are available. Pull to refresh is needed to load next chunk of messages. This turns into nightmare when the whole history is needed. 3. Not clear why only 6 languages to communicate (3 to learn and 3 to teach) are available at a time. I understand this is a special case, but I miss at least one language to teach.
A great app for language learning. People are amazing and the app is easy to use. I highly recommend it.

Jammer dat HelloTalk hier niet voor waarschuwt. Ik vind de app geweldig, maar heb nog nooit foto's of video's ontvangen of verstuurd.

nobody is online...
A nice app very helpfull to learn a language.

It is nice to talk to people in your target language or help them in your (native) language. I'm talking with people from all over the world and I love it. Also a plus for the timestamp for the other person, sometimes you forget that it is really late or early for them.
Mostly nice people and a fun way to get more used to a language

Thank you so much for this app, I met an amazing friend for live and I don't know what I would've done if he wasn't there. We're planning on meeting in August 2019 I've never been happier and we still text each other every day. (I live in Belgium and he in England) ‚ô•Ô∏è
have had this app for 2 weeks now. send out messages to +20 people, no replies what so ever. Am I doing something wrong?
I met a lot of really nice people through this app! Would recommend.
Great app!

Great way to meet people and practice languages and make new friends. The app itself is minimalistic which I find a good thing. Some features are hidden though. It misses something like a total overview of things changed in your circle.

A great and fun app for anyone who wants to learn a language!

The app is fine, but I keep echoing in group calls.  I also want to add that, when in a group call when a new user joins the group call the speaker automatically turns on when it's not even turned on at my side. So I have to keep clicking the speaker button each time a new user joins so the sound doesn't blast out of my speakers when people are talking.
Very useful

I updated to the latest version 2.4.6 and now I can't see any moments even though there are moments..I see nothing no moments from my friends no moments in general no notifications..completely nothing I already tried texting hellotalk team on hellotalk itself but they didn't even read it I also sended an email and they didn't even responded..I really liked the app but now I just see nothing I already made a new acc hoping it would go back to normal but no it didn't and now I also lost all my friends and chats..I really hope you can solve this problem.

Heel leuke app :) sommige toepassingen zijn niet zo heel duidelijk in het begin. Maar ik kan vlot met mensen in contact komen om mijn talen te oefenen. De functie om elkaars teksten te verbeteren, is heel handig en leerzaam! Er is ook een newsfeed waarin je dingen kan posten, een beetje Facebook-achtig in een taal naar keuze. Aangename app!
Ik hou van praten via hello talk. Hello talk gaf mij de mogelijkheid dat ik nu binnen 5 maanden redelijk goed engels kan spreken

Excellent app, great way of learning, but it's difficult to find partners and it's silly that you can't select multiple native languages. I understand that they want to keep something for the VIPs, so you can't learn more than 1 language at a time, but I don't get why you couldn't teach multiple. Then you're only giving back to the community and improving the usefulness of the app
would be better if the languages are not limited for free users...
